title: Any Plans for Honor 0-1 level up indicators?
body:
I was issued a 14- day ban on a second account that I completely deserved last season. Since then, I'd like to think that I've improved my self-control and have reformed. 

That being said, I keep trying to keep a clean slate and level up my honor but ive played around 100 games since my ban and I am still Honor 0. Based on the new PBE Honor update, are there any plans for a progress indicator for getting out of dishonorable ranks?

It doesn't have to be "play x games without being reported". Literally something as little as a pop up saying "You've been improving your behavior. Keep it up and you will regain honor rewards!" 

Thanks

replies.body: This is a good point. It's something that is on our radar, but we don't have an answer to it right now.
